name: Abarth 124 Spider 1.4 MultiAir 16v 2016 Manual 2 doors specs
description:
Abarth 124 Spider 1.4 MultiAir 16v is a 2016 Convertible model with 6 speed manual transmission.
    
With a power of 125 KW you can reach  0-100km h in just 6,8 seconds and a maximum speed of 232 km/h with an urban consumption of 8,5 l/100km.
The engine has a capacity of 1368 cc with 4, in line cylinders and 4 valves per cylinders.
